long_description: Keep your head warm without overheating while you're running, biking and hiking in cool weather with the REI Airflyte Neon beanie. Powerflyte material blends polyester, nylon and spandex for a great fit and outstanding dexterity; fabric breathes well, dries fast and provides good warmth. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Bright neon panels and reflective hits on front and back increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Keep your head warm without overheating while you're running, biking and hiking in cool weather with the REI Airflyte Neon beanie.
